revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=RPF |model=Raspberry Pi Zero |revision=W (512MB) V1.1 |asin=B06XFZC3BX |price=10 |manuf_country=UK |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now <!-- Until January 2022 --> |est_release_date=03/06/2017 |fcc_date=02/28/2017 |fcc_id=2ABCB-RPI0W |ic_id=20953-RPI0W |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2835 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=B4432BBPA-1D-F |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43438 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Dual PWM Step Down DC-DC Converter;Diodes Inc.;PAM2306;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, Micro SD Card slot, Mini HDMI output, Micro USB, CSI, GPIO, |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} :[https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/pi-zero-w/ Product page]
''Raspberry Pi Zero W V1.1 © Raspberry Pi 2016'' is silkscreened on the board.
This is the same as the [[RPF Raspberry Pi Zero]] with the addition :of the WiFi & Bluetooth of the [[RPF Raspberry Pi 3 Model B]]
{{WPLink|Raspberry_Pi}} {{See also|RPF Raspberry Pi series}}
===Specifications=== *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Zero W]] (512MB) • [https://www.raspberrypi.org/blog/raspberry-pi-zero-w/ Blog] ([https://shop.pimoroni.com/products/raspberry-pi-zero-w Shop]) :SoC: [[Broadcom]] BCM2835 Single-core CPU (ARM11) @1.0GHz :512MB RAM (''Elpida'' B4432BBPA-10-F), Mini HDMI (1080p60) :Micro SD, USB OTG ports, Micro USB data/power, 40-pin GPIO
